name: ELEKS
body:
### Welcome to ELEKS open-source projects directory.
[ELEKS](http://eleks.com) is a software development services company. Even though we mainly develop proprietary software for our customers, we have our own open-source projects and contribute to projects maintained by other people and organizations. Here you can find a list of open-source projects we maintain or contribute to.

### ELEKS Open-source projects
[ADEL](https://github.com/eleks/ADEL) - template-based automatic differentiation library for C++/CUDA.

[GPU Benchmark](https://github.com/eleks/GPUBenchmark) - a set of synthetic tests to measure NVIDIA GPU performance. You can find results of its execution at our blog-post: [NVIDIA Tesla K20 benchmark: facts, figures and some conclusions](http://www.elekslabs.com/2012/11/nvidia-tesla-k20-benchmark-facts.html). 

### Projects we contribute to
[Event Store](http://geteventstore.com) - an awesome, rock-solid, super-fast persistence engine for event-sourced applications. ELEKS employees @anakryiko, @ysw, @kpyatkivskyy, @MarkiyanMatsekh and @TarasRoshko are the most active contributors to this project.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
